title: Realme 16 Pro Series Launch Live: Expected price, colours, features and what we know so far
snippet: Realme 16 Pro Series India Launch Live: Realme is set to launch the Realme16 Pro series in India today, with 200MP triple cameras, 7,000mAh batteries, and high-refresh AMOLED displays. These devices will be available for sale via Flipkart and the Realme India store.

title: CES 2026 – Uber reveals feature-rich self-driving robotaxi; Lucid and Nuro bring 360-degree autonomous sensors
snippet: Lucid Group, Nuro and Uber have unveiled their production-intent robotaxi at CES 2026, confirming autonomous road testing in the San Francisco Bay Area ahead of a planned launch later this year, with the vehicle and in-cabin rider experience shown publicly for the first time.

title: These laptops for working professionals should be on your watch list in 2026
snippet: Looking for a work laptop in 2026? These picks focus on performance, portability and everyday reliability to match the needs of modern working professionals.

title: Realme 16 Pro, 16 Pro+ launch in India today: When, where and how to watch the livestream
snippet: Realme is set to launch the Realme 16 Pro and Realme 16 Pro+ in India today. The event will be livestreamed on Realme India’s official YouTube channel at 12 noon, where the company will reveal prices, features and availability details.

title: Self-driving tech, AI take center stage at CES as automakers dial back EV plans

title: Realme 16 Pro, Realme 16 Pro+ India launch tomorrow: 200MP camera, AMOLED display and what to expect
snippet: Realme is set to launch the Realme 16 Pro and Realme 16 Pro+ in India on January 6. The new premium smartphones are expected to feature AMOLED displays, 200MP cameras, powerful chipsets, large 7,000mAh batteries, and Android 16-based Realme UI 7.0.

title: Projectors for movie nights I was scrolling Amazon and noticed up to 68% off on a few picks that look worth grabbing
snippet: I scanned Amazon’s projector deals today and found up to 68% off on picks for movie and match nights including smart 1080p options with decent speakers.

title: Redmi Note 15 5G India launch tomorrow: Display, Snapdragon 6 Gen 3, 108MP camera and price expectations
snippet: Redmi Note 15 5G is set to launch in India on January 6 at 11AM IST alongside the Redmi Pad 2 Pro. The mid-range smartphone is expected to feature a 6.77-inch curved AMOLED display, Snapdragon 6 Gen 3 chip, 108MP camera, 5,520mAh battery and 45W fast charging.

title: Nvidia CEO Huang says next generation of chips is in full production
snippet: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said ⁠on Monday that the company's next generation of chips is in "full production," saying they can deliver five times the artificial-intelligence computing of the company's previous chips when serving up chatbots and other AI apps.

snippet: Huang, who spoke during CES, an annual tech conference in Las Vegas, also discussed Nvidia's surprisingly ambitious work around autonomous vehicles. title: Wipro now mandates six hours WFO in hybrid work tweak
snippet: Software exporter Wipro has tightened its work-from-office policy, mandating employees to stay at least six hours in office for three days a week, in a shift from the earlier flexible hours. title: AI + acqui-hire is the new-age growth mantra
snippet: One theme that dominated headlines amid billion-dollar M&As in the AI sector was the acqui-hire. These deals were focused on retaining founders, researchers, and engineering teams from joining competition, rather than procuring the startup’s product or revenue.
